item.title: HexHive Supports Matrix
item.description: With the recent lockdown in New Zealand remote collaboration is at the forefront of everyone's minds again, HexHive has been in the process of pivoting to focus on integrations so it seemed like a perfect time to integrate with one of the best open source products out there, Matrix.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Blog features are powered by the blog plugin. Simply add files to the blog directory. It supports tags as well!

item.title: Hello
item.description: Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with Docusaurus 2.
